branchCategory.name: AFW
branchCategory.description: <p>AFW large capacity compressed air filters and centrifugal water separators ensure high quality compressed air, which is essential to pneumatic and automation systems.&nbsp; Correct air preparation minimizes component failure, increases the operating life of equipment and reduces energy consumption.&nbsp; Filters and separators are suitable for use with mineral and synthetic oils, plus oil-free compressed air applications.&nbsp; Depending on the model, flow capacities are available from&nbsp;150 to 1500 CFM.&nbsp; The AFW is available for US and Canadian customers only.</p>

branchItem.name: AFW, Large Capacity Compressed Air Threaded Filter
